Sentencas: Y-doped BaZrO3 (BZY) is an outstanding proton conductor under wet atmosphere at relatively low temperatures (<600 degrees C).
Titulo: Direct evidence of potential barriers at grain boundaries in Y-doped BaZrO3 from dc-bias dependence measurements

Sentencas: Dense polycrystalline ceramics of this material used in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells as solid electrolytes, however, suffer from uniquely high resistance across grain boundaries in the materials.
Titulo: Direct evidence of potential barriers at grain boundaries in Y-doped BaZrO3 from dc-bias dependence measurements

Sentencas: It has long been speculated that such high resistance at the grain boundaries is originated from potential barriers which may be formed at the grain boundaries.
Titulo: Direct evidence of potential barriers at grain boundaries in Y-doped BaZrO3 from dc-bias dependence measurements

Sentencas: Here we provide direct experimental evidence that Schottky-type potential barriers indeed exist at grain boundaries in BZY.
Titulo: Direct evidence of potential barriers at grain boundaries in Y-doped BaZrO3 from dc-bias dependence measurements

Sentencas: The results of our study on dc-bias dependence of grain-boundary impedance in 5, 3 and 2 mol% Y-doped BaZrO3 (BZY5, BZY3, and BZY2, respectively) clearly show that the relation between the current across a grain boundary and the applied dc-bias is ohmic where the dc-bias is lower than the thermal voltage, while that becomes superohmic at sufficiently high biases.
Titulo: Direct evidence of potential barriers at grain boundaries in Y-doped BaZrO3 from dc-bias dependence measurements

Sentencas: In addition, it is found that the capacitance of the grain boundary decreases with the bias.
Titulo: Direct evidence of potential barriers at grain boundaries in Y-doped BaZrO3 from dc-bias dependence measurements

Sentencas: These observations are consistent with what is expected from the thermionic emission mechanism for a current across a potential barrier.
Titulo: Direct evidence of potential barriers at grain boundaries in Y-doped BaZrO3 from dc-bias dependence measurements

Sentencas: Hence we unambiguously verified that Schottky-type potential barriers are formed at grain boundaries in BZY to serve as extra internal resistors, and are responsible for high grain-boundary resistance observed in polycrystalline BZY ceramics.
Titulo: Direct evidence of potential barriers at grain boundaries in Y-doped BaZrO3 from dc-bias dependence measurements

Sentencas: The barrier heights estimated for BZY5, BZY3, and BZY2 are 0.51, 0.85, and 0.95 V, respectively.
Titulo: Direct evidence of potential barriers at grain boundaries in Y-doped BaZrO3 from dc-bias dependence measurements
